entry.title: Statiscally Regularities
entry.content:
A modified dice game

When we roll a dice we canâ€™t say what will be the outcome but what can we say that out of {1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6} any one will be the outcome.So obviously this is random process. Now let modified the dice.

How to get the radomness in computer

Random experiment can give you a regular pattern

Lets progarm it

Other such pattern
entry.summary: Randomness may not be random for large number of experiment
